name: $proposal
desc: The request represents an intention to ensure something occurs without providing an authorization for others to act.

name: $plan
desc: The request represents a request/demand and authorization for action

name: $order
desc: The request represents the original authorization for the medication request.

name: $original-order
desc: The request represents an automatically generated supplemental authorization for action based on a parent authorization together with initial results of the action taken against that parent authorization..

name: $reflex-order
desc: The request represents the view of an authorization instantiated by a fulfilling system representing the details of the fulfiller's intention to act upon a submitted order.

name: $filler-order
desc: The request represents an instance for the particular order, for example a medication administration record.

name: $instance-order
desc: The request represents a component or option for a RequestGroup that establishes timing, conditionality and/or  other constraints among a set of requests.
